fields.headline: Azed crossword 2,394
fields.bodyText: Click here for a printable version. The Chambers Dictionary (2014) is recommended. It gives one answer as an abbreviation. Prize Rules: £25 in book tokens for the first three correct solutions opened. Send solutions postmarked no later than Saturday to Azed No. 2,388, The Observer, 90 York Way, London N1 9GU.
